question: A restaurant has placed an advertisement for a manager in the local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this jobTell them  when you are free to attend an interview
text: I would like to present myself for the post of manager in your restaurant, that I saw in the advertisement in today's local newspaper. I would really like to apply for this role.

My self Unnikrishnan, post-graduation on hotel management. I have been working for the last 7 years as an assistant manager , managing the clients or guests, the events and the kitchen of the hotel. As I have dealt with many guest, events and kitchen needs, It would further help me to deal with your restaurant sections.

I would   to like emphasise  the fact that  this job is inevitable for me as I would be gaining a lot of opportunities  and experience.  Dealing with the huge customers and their needs push me to another level of my carrier.
If you are interested in my profile. I would like to attend the interview any time  between 9am-1pm. So that it won't make any distraction on my current job.
I look forward to hearing you soon

error_list.error_des: It seems that guest may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
